dct_title_s: Riparian map of properties along Hudson River, Bergen County, map no. 2
dct_description_sm: Riparian map of personal and business property leases along the Hudson River in Bergen County, New Jersey
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Year is inferred from latest date written on map, September 24th, 1895
